content: A-GTB Abrasive Belts - SP Premium Ultimate abrasive tube belts for rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel, aluminum and other metals ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Achieve most common metalwork surface finishes with our broad grade selection for rough to fine grinding Also available in coarse grain sizes for rougher grinding Developed for best results with Hilti variable-speed abrasive tools for professional metalwork Applications Rough to fine grinding of stainless steel, steel, aluminum and other metals Obtaining linear medium and fine satin finishes on stainless steel, aluminum and other metals ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Length: 29.9 in Width: 1-9/16 in Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Base material | Steel, Stainless steel ### ITEMS- 2243163 - Abrasive belt A-GTB 40x760 P40 SP - Package Size 20 pc - 2243164 - Abrasive belt A-GTB 40x760 P60 SP - Package Size 20 pc - 2243165 - Abrasive belt A-GTB 40x760 P80 SP - Package Size 20 pc - 2243166 - Abrasive belt A-GTB 40x760 P120 SP - Package Size 20 pc
